name: Big Ben's Arcade
description:
Made in a handful of days for Untitled Game Jam #24, themes: retro & top down.  

WASD to move and SPACE to interact for almost everything.  ESC to go back to the previous screen.

Use the ARROW keys in the shooter arcade game to look around.

Song on the platformer - 'Fun Factory' by Visager (https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Visager).

There are some known bugs as this is a jam game.  As those get patched, if you get stuck, hit ESC and go back to play again.
